amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 117-285 to state that cannabis use shall not be the reason for denying or rescinding a security clearance.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to state that cannabis use shall not be the reason for denying or rescinding a security clearance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Raskin amendment (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 209 - 214 (Roll no. 105).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Raskin.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Raskin amendment (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 209 - 214 (Roll no. 105).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Raskin amendment (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 209 - 214 (Roll no. 105).
